text: Desiree Miller (born 12 August 1987) is an American wheelchair basketball player. She won a gold medal at the 2016 Summer Paralympics. She played at the 2012 Summer Paralympics and 2015 Parapan American Games. She was born in Kirkland, Washington. She lived in Monroe, Washington. She studied at University of Alabama and University of Wisconsin-Whitewater. == References == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:American wheelchair basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Washington (state)
title: Desiree Miller
